content: In addition to the given prompt, include a requirement that the specific characteristics of the garden must include at least one element that is not typically associated with beauty or gardening, such as a functional or sustainable feature. Output the rewritten sentence.

In addition to the given prompt, include a requirement that the specific characteristics of the garden must include at least one element that is not typically associated with beauty or gardening, such as a functional or sustainable feature, like a rainwater harvesting system or a composting area.
